entities.name: dolores umbridge
entities.description: Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as Senior Undersecretary to the Minister and Head of the Muggleborn Registration Commission. She is described as having a plaque beneath her eye with her title.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as looking back at the dozen pamphlet-makers and placing a Decoy Detonator on the ground.

entities.name: december detonator
entities.description: The Decoy Detonator is described as having little waving legs and a rubber-bulbed horn for a body.

relationships.description: Harry placed the Decoy Detonator on the ground, indicating that he used it.
Dolores Umbridge is mentioned as Head of the Muggleborn Registration Commission.
